basics.name: William R. Johnson
basics.title: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Seeking a front-end or full-stack web development position.

highlights: Became responsible for upgrading the dependencies for all of our projects.
Gave presentations and introduced new React techniques like Fragments and Render-Props.
Completely rebuilt the UI my product.
Built a dynamically generated page flow system. Pages were generated from data returned from a REST API.
Regularly contributed to our core React frameworks.
Mentored and trained junior developers on React.

work.summary: Design and manage infrastructure on Google Cloud and Firebase. Made all of the software architecture decisions. Wrote all of the code. Responded to outages and server issues.
highlights: Developed a prototype app using React-Native.
Setup and maintaned infrastructure using Google Cloud
Built a service to automatically retrieve and update LetsEncrypt certificates for TLS/SSL encryption.
Wrote an audit-log service that lisented for changes in Firebase and inserted a change summary into Google BigQuery.
Setup Jenkins for continuous integration with Github.
Deployed a Kubernetes cluster using Google Container Engine.

work.summary: Designed, developed, and deployed features for the Salesloft SAAS application. Touched upon everything from database design and migrations to front-end UX design and development.
highlights: Developed a new QA system using Docker. Different versions of our application could be tested simultaneously and on the same server cluster.

work.summary: In charge of researching and developing core software frameworks and coding standards as well as interviewing and training new engineers.
highlights: Developed an interactive visualization tool for retail stores using HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript. Think Google Maps but for retail stores.
Designed and developed a custom REST API framework in PHP.
Developed a graph-based API query system (before GraphQL existed).

work.summary: Developed tools and prototypes for the Core Applications Team.
highlights: Implemented a rectangle-packing algorithm in Java with the purpose of combining multiple images into a single, large image. The overhead for each HTTP request was significant so using a single image reduced load time.
Wrote a prototype TV guide application featuring a lazy-loading system. Data was loaded as-needed and significantly reduced infrastructure requirements.

publications.name: My quest to learn machine learning
publications.summary: A quick overview of some recent milestones in my quest to learn machine learning.
